title: Hogel Manor
blockb: Action: Spend 8 progress to raise Sunrider alliance track by one.

title: Horsethief Meadows
blockb: Action: Spend 8 progress to raise military track by one.

title: Arban the Swift
blocka: Test: Command 2. Success: +1 Sunrider alliance. Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.

title: Feast at Hogel Manor
blockc: Action: Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: Song Bluff
blocka: Effect: All characters have +1 Tactics while at least one character is at this location.

title: Uneasy Truce
blockc: Action: Unlock Mission: Gravewood. Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Ile
blocka: Test: Lore 2. Success: +1 Sunrider alliance. Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.

title: Taichu
blocka: Test: Tactics 2. Success: +1 Sunrider alliance. Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.

title: Rumors of Smoke and Fire
blockc: Action: Spend 7 progress. Unlock Mission: Pelakhar's Loyalty. MISSION COMPLETE.

title: Hogel
blocka: Test: Rapport 2. Success: +1 Sunrider alliance. Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.

title: Dashen
blocka: Test: Rapport 2. Success: +1 Sunrider alliance. Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.

title: Arban the Swift's Sunset Ride
blockb: Success: +1 Command. Burn card. Failure: Frustrated.

title: Battle Plans
blockb: Success: +1 Tactics. Burn card.	Failure: +1 Discord.

title: A Bitter Grudge
blocka: Condition: Angry Character. Effect: Play on angry character. Rapport tests are difficult for remainder of mission. Discard effect if angry condition is removed.

title: Shame To Anger
blocka: Condition: Frustrated Character. Result: A frustrated character gains the angry condition.
